MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY17 postcode area of Caersws, affecting properties in Clatter, Llanwnog and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.59am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.47am on 11th of Jan 2021.
